title: Vestas Wind Systems Weekly News Summary
body:
**Analyst Rating Upgrade**

On December 12, 2025, Kepler Capital Markets upgraded Vestas Wind Systems AS (OTCMKTS:VWDRY) from a "strong sell" to a "strong-buy" rating, indicating increased confidence in the company's prospects. ([defenseworld.net](https://www.defenseworld.net/2025/12/12/kepler-capital-markets-upgrades-vestas-wind-systems-as-otcmktsvwdry-to-strong-buy.html?utm_source=openai))

**Analyst Consensus**

As of December 8, 2025, Vestas Wind Systems AS received an average recommendation of "Reduce" from six ratings firms, with two analysts rating the stock as "sell," three as "hold," and one as "buy." ([americanbankingnews.com](https://www.americanbankingnews.com/2025/12/08/vestas-wind-systems-as-otcmktsvwdry-given-average-recommendation-of-reduce-by-analysts.html?utm_source=openai))

key_dates.title: Kepler Capital Markets Upgrades Vestas Wind Systems AS to Strong-Buy
key_dates.importance_for_price: This upgrade may positively influence investor sentiment and potentially lead to an increase in the company's stock price.

key_dates.title: Analyst Consensus on Vestas Wind Systems AS: 'Reduce' Rating
key_dates.importance_for_price: The 'Reduce' rating reflects a cautious outlook from analysts, which could exert downward pressure on the stock price.
